page.title: 02Farming
page.content: New Market Garden. This is a new enterprise started over the last year. The house was built in 1984. This market garden is 13 acres and is split up into different types of fruit. {5 acres under strawberries. {2 acres under raspberries. {1/2 acre under blackcurrants. It is good soil but the top end of the garden is very sandy.The owner had a previous job in the Scottish Agricultural Organisation.He left his last job in 1980.He has now started self-pick vegetables.He also has a lot of shrubs for the local market gardens.The new house was not on our map which shows how rapidly maps go out of date. The garden lies between Middle Grange Farm and West Grange Farm.
